channel.title: Enterprise on KrakenD - Open source API Gateway
channel.description: Recent content in Enterprise on KrakenD - Open source API Gateway

item.title: Open sourcing all enterprise components
item.description: What are known today as the KrakenD Enterprise components will be disclosed in the form of open source repositories in the following weeks, and the action has already started, don’t miss it! In this post we will explain the reasons behind this decision that might sound crazy from a business perspective in the first place. Why anyone would publish the paid software increment bits of an existing free software? A look back… If you are reading this post chances are that you know this already, in short KrakenD is the fastest API Gateway in the market.
